english.segment1: Call me a liar, Call me your friend. I will let you down again, 'Cause I'm a disaster of epic proportions. I will let you down again.
english.segment2: I am not wanting to become your savior, I am not going to catch, my own flame. But to warn you, some may fall on my name.
english.segment3: How could you do this to all your believers?. How could you do this to all your friends?
english.segment4: You know this is the end. I know this is the end. I know this is the end.
